list.name: Changes
list.comment: Manufactories & Province Logic +Added second tier buildings called manufactories that take in a raw resource as an input and output a more advanced resources +Started to add game logic to province, specifically handling construction offices and the construction queue +Added an enumerator for Time to make it easier to handle +Added Steel resource

task.summary: JavaFX implementation -Started to implement a GUI using JavaFX, experimenting with different techniques. -Made modifications to program to allow access of the world map outside of the worldgenerator package using an adaptor.
Added rest of files that I forgot to stage

New UI, bug fixes, performance improvements -Big part is the new UI, which can now generate worlds and visually display the different data via the interface. This will be later used to visually display the history simulation. -To improve performance, rather than directly painting to canvas the map is painted to a BufferedImage. This BufferedImage is then painted on to the canvas, which significantly speeds up the program. -Made improvements to the poleStrength so that it adjusts to different map sizes. -Create a climate enumerator as the application version of biome
Save System -Added a rudimentary save system -Truncated decimals for elevation, precipitation, and temperature. This saves a lot of space when the file is saved which wasn't really being used much.
Save and Load System -Created a saving and loading system that is accessed via popups -Each save has to have a unique name -All save files are displayed via listview in the loading popup

Resource Framework -Created a framework for resources to be handled when resource generation is implemented -Separated into three distinct categories, organics, non-organics, and metals -Also added a fertility variable to the WorldTile, which will later be used to determine quality and quantity of crops -So far only basic resources, extracted from deposits, have been added. Later on industrial and luxury resources will be added, each which require manufacture.

Metal spawning -Added the logic for spawning metals on the world map, values are experimental and will be changed to produce satisfactory results -Added a hill level and mountain level to the WorldMap, making it easier to track these values during the hisory simulation

Tags & New Map Modes -Added a tagging system to make it easier to determine the uses of a resource later on -Added new map modes for the new resource deposits and fertility -Added a resource abstract class to represent all resources -New issue with loading due to abstract classes, will have to find a fix later -Issue with fertility map mode where some water is filled in as land, will need to be investigated

Regions & Abstract Class Saving +Added a new provinces class. This will later be used to handle much of the simulation and the state and town level. +Implemented a type adapter for the abstract classes, fixing saving and loading issues

Time -Created a new simulator clock to simulate the passage of time within the simulation. -Created an observer interface for SimulatorClock so that objects can be informed when a certain amount of time has passed.

Zoom -Implemented a zoomable ScrollPane -Credit to Daniel Hari on Stackoverflow for the code -Source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39827911/javafx-8-scaling-zooming-scrollpane-relative-to-mouse-position

Buildings +Implemented new buildings objects to handle the production of resources +Created Manufactory subclass of Building, which once completed will be able to take in inputs depending on Tag or Resource and extract those from the stockpile before providing output +Added a new Resource Stockpile abstract class, will later transition most extending from ResourceDeposit to a specific deposit class

Manufactories & Province Logic +Added second tier buildings called manufactories that take in a raw resource as an input and output a more advanced resources +Started to add game logic to province, specifically handling construction offices and the construction queue +Added an enumerator for Time to make it easier to handle +Added Steel resource
